legalResidency.title: Legal residency status in Kazakhstan

workPermit.description: Apply for employment permits and establish business ventures in Kazakhstan's growing economy

banking.description: Open bank accounts, apply for loans, and access comprehensive Kazakhstan financial services

socialInsurance.description: Access Kazakhstan's healthcare system and participate in social insurance programs

familyReunification.title: Family reunification opportunities
familyReunification.description: Bring your family members to Kazakhstan and apply for their residence permits

permanentResidence.title: Path to Kazakhstan permanent residence
permanentResidence.description: Qualify for long-term residence options and potential permanent residence eligibility in Kazakhstan
